name: Truck Sim: Extreme Driving Hil
description:
Truck Sim: Extreme Driving Hill Road!!!
Let's start a heavy engine, drive real cargo truck and feel the power of the heavy engine with furious jungle and city of high traffic. Your offroad driving transport truck might be carrying relief cargo so drive carefully. Paths are difficult drive on, but not only planes are used for cargo transport, you can handle this job with your transport cargo truck uphill driving simulator 3D. An objective based transport truck games where you handle your big truck with heavy duty trailer truck on uphill terrain offroad games.
Features:
Amazing 3D graphics.
Heavy truck with a real drive.
Free game play
Challenging roads.
Compatible with all tabs and mobile devices.
Challenging environment.
